mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_dict_coll_frequency ( C_DAY, C_DESC, C_FREQUENCY, C_FREQUENCY_UNIT, C_HOUR, C_ID, C_METRIC_TYPE, C_MINUTE, C_MONTH, C_NAME, C_NAME_EN, C_SORT_ID, C_TYPE, C_WEEK ) VALUES( #{day ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{desc ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frequency ,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{frequencyUnit ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hour ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{id ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{metricType ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{minute ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{month ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nameEn ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortId ,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{type ,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{week ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

INSERT INTO t_dict_coll_frequency ( C_DAY, C_DESC, C_FREQUENCY, C_FREQUENCY_UNIT, C_HOUR, C_ID, C_METRIC_TYPE, C_MINUTE, C_MONTH, C_NAME, C_NAME_EN, C_SORT_ID, C_TYPE, C_WEEK ) VALUES
( #{item.day}, #{item.desc}, #{item.frequency}, #{item.frequencyUnit}, #{item.hour}, #{item.id}, #{item.metricType}, #{item.minute}, #{item.month}, #{item.name}, #{item.nameEn}, #{item.sortId}, #{item.type}, #{item.week} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_dict_coll_frequency SET C_DAY = #{day ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_DESC = #{desc ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_FREQUENCY = #{frequency ,jdbcType=INTEGER}, C_FREQUENCY_UNIT = #{frequencyUnit ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_HOUR = #{hour ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_ID = #{id ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_METRIC_TYPE = #{metricType ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_MINUTE = #{minute ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_MONTH = #{month ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_NAME = #{name ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_NAME_EN = #{nameEn ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_SORT_ID = #{sortId ,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, C_TYPE = #{type ,jdbcType=TINYINT}, C_WEEK = #{week ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE C_ID = #{id ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT C_DAY, C_DESC, C_FREQUENCY, C_FREQUENCY_UNIT, C_HOUR, C_ID, C_METRIC_TYPE, C_MINUTE, C_MONTH, C_NAME, C_NAME_EN, C_SORT_ID, C_TYPE, C_WEEK FROM t_dict_coll_frequency WHERE C_ID = #{id ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT C_DAY, C_DESC, C_FREQUENCY, C_FREQUENCY_UNIT, C_HOUR, C_ID, C_METRIC_TYPE, C_MINUTE, C_MONTH, C_NAME, C_NAME_EN, C_SORT_ID, C_TYPE, C_WEEK FROM t_dict_coll_frequency
${orderBy}

SELECT C_DAY, C_DESC, C_FREQUENCY, C_FREQUENCY_UNIT, C_HOUR, C_ID, C_METRIC_TYPE, C_MINUTE, C_MONTH, C_NAME, C_NAME_EN, C_SORT_ID, C_TYPE, C_WEEK FROM t_dict_coll_frequency
${orderBy}

SELECT C_DAY, C_DESC, C_FREQUENCY, C_FREQUENCY_UNIT, C_HOUR, C_ID, C_METRIC_TYPE, C_MINUTE, C_MONTH, C_NAME, C_NAME_EN, C_SORT_ID, C_TYPE, C_WEEK FROM t_dict_coll_frequency
${orderBy}
